summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Superintendent of Water and the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to enter into an Interagency Agreement with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle, authorizing the Superintendent of Water to accept the terms of an easement with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle, and accepting easements over portions of Sections 9, 15 and 16, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W.M., for water pipeline and water meter purposes.
